section.title: projects copying of Copy Projects
section.para: To make a copy of a project, select the "Copy Project" option. The following screen will appear:
When copying a Bill of Materials, you are presented with the following option:

varlistentry.term: Project Number for the new Project

listitem.para: Enter the Project Number for the new Project.

section.para: After the new Project Number has been entered, the following screen will appear:
